impact-statement: Tracking individual mice within a group makes it possible to quantify and model social behavior, and reveals that the behavior of the group goes beyond pairwise interactions, and is shaped by complex interactions between multiple individuals.

competing-interest.conf1: The authors declare that no competing interests exist.
